alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 21 at 3:59PM EST until January 22 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Cape May and Atlantic Coastal Cape May. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor coastal flooding may again be seen during the high tide cycle Monday morning. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Great Egg Harbor Bay at Ocean City MLLW Categories - Minor 5.3 ft, Moderate 6.3 ft, Major 7.3 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 21/08 PM 4.1 0.1 0.7 None 22/08 AM 5.4 1.4 0.4 Minor 22/08 PM 4.1 0.1 0.6 None 23/09 AM 5.5 1.5 0.6 Minor 23/09 PM 3.7 -0.3 0.0 None 24/09 AM 4.3 0.3 -0.2 None Cape May Harbor at Cape May MLLW Categories - Minor 6.2 ft, Moderate 7.2 ft, Major 8.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.1 ft, Moderate 2.1 ft, Major 3.1 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 21/08 PM 5.0 -0.1 0.9 None 22/08 AM 6.6 1.5 0.6 Minor 22/09 PM 5.2 0.1 0.9 None 23/09 AM 6.6 1.5 0.7 Minor 23/09 PM 4.6 -0.5 0.2 None 24/09 AM 5.6 0.5 0.1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May
